name: Fight Circus Crypto Night
description: ‚ÄãStep into a world where modern content trends meet inimitable entertainment in Fight Circus, a variety show blending high-energy fights, comedy, and music. This unforgettable event will feature unique matchups, including the highly anticipated Muay Show clash between world sensation Blobtang and Moo Daeng, 4-person pillow fights, and ring girl leg wrestling.

description: ‚ÄãStarting at 420PM at Pineapple Express we will be going around as many weed shops as possible in Chiang Mai, smoking 1 blunt at every shop until we pass out.

name: Permissionless III Pickleball Tournament
description: Official Permissionless III Pickleball Tournament. Interested in playing in the Official Permissionless III Pickleball Tournament? Grab a team of three (or two but it helps to have an extra on hand just in case!!) and register below! All registrants MUST have a Permissionless III ticket in order to participate. Space is limited. All submissions will be notified of status. Please don't contact the organizers to check on your submission.
